script.code:
import javax.naming.ldap.Rdn import javax.naming.ldap.LdapName
dn = new LdapName('ou=people,dc=example,dc=com') dn.add(new Rdn('uid',name.toString())) return dn.toString()

import javax.naming.ldap.Rdn import javax.naming.ldap.LdapName
dn = new LdapName('ou=groups,dc=example,dc=com') dn.add(new Rdn('cn', name.toString())) return dn.toString()

import javax.naming.ldap.Rdn import javax.naming.ldap.LdapName
dn = new LdapName('ou=unixgroups,dc=example,dc=com') dn.add(new Rdn('cn', name.toString())) return dn.toString()
